price: 44. Naxariis Xaggayaga ah mooyee iyo raaxo ilaa muddo ah.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
